update.description:
I have created a [testing branch](#!/osrf/subt/branch/default_topics_testing) that uses models uploaded to my fuel account. Currently only X1 configurations have been uploaded. I'll continue to upload the rest.

Example test (using the default_topics_testing branch)
```
ign launch -v 4 virtual_stix.ign robotName1:=X1_C1 robotName2:=X1_C2 robotName3:=X1_C3 robotName4:=X1_C4 robotConfig1:=X1_SENSOR_CONFIG_1 robotConfig2:=X1_SENSOR_CONFIG_2 robotConfig3:=X1_SENSOR_CONFIG_3 robotConfig4:=X1_SENSOR_CONFIG_4
```
On the ROS side topic names should conform to the pattern specified in the [API Docs](#!/osrf/subt/wiki/api). `frame_id`s follow the pattern `<ROBOT_NAME>/base_link/<sensor name>`

**Depends on:**

 * [ign-gazebo #364]( https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-gazebo/pull-requests/364)
*  [ign-sensors #74](https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-sensors/pull-requests/74)
update.title: Modify topic remaps to use sensor default topics

content.raw:
Update: I bridged fluid pressure and magnetic field sensor topics in  [49ad893](#!/osrf/subt/commits/49ad893ee86789f5af5cc8fecc58dd95f7d4d980)

I manually checked a few different robot configurations and confirmed that sensor data should now work properly. Two robots with same configuration also works \(fixes issue #75\)

After this is merged, we’ll need to make a new release of ign-gazebo and ign-sensors before I can upload the updated robot models onto ignition fuel, otherwise users may run into a crash without this fix from [ign-gazebo pull request](https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-gazebo/pull-requests/363/set-default-topics-for-rendering-sensors/diff)
content.html:
Update: I bridged fluid pressure and magnetic field sensor topics in 49ad893

I manually checked a few different robot configurations and confirmed that sensor data should now work properly. Two robots with same configuration also works (fixes issue #75)

After this is merged, we’ll need to make a new release of ign-gazebo and ign-sensors before I can upload the updated robot models onto ignition fuel, otherwise users may run into a crash without this fix from ign-gazebo pull request

pull_request.title: Modify topic remaps to use sensor default topics

update.description:
I have created a [testing branch](#!/osrf/subt/branch/default_topics_testing) that uses models uploaded to my fuel account. Currently only X1 configurations have been uploaded. I'll continue to upload the rest.

Example test (using the default_topics_testing branch)
```
ign launch -v 4 virtual_stix.ign robotName1:=X1_C1 robotName2:=X1_C2 robotName3:=X1_C3 robotName4:=X1_C4 robotConfig1:=X1_SENSOR_CONFIG_1 robotConfig2:=X1_SENSOR_CONFIG_2 robotConfig3:=X1_SENSOR_CONFIG_3 robotConfig4:=X1_SENSOR_CONFIG_4
```
On the ROS side topic names should conform to the pattern specified in the [API Docs](#!/osrf/subt/wiki/api). `frame_id`s follow the pattern `<ROBOT_NAME>/base_link/<sensor name>`

**Depends on:**

 * [ign-gazebo #364]( https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-gazebo/pull-requests/364)
*  [ign-sensors #74](https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-sensors/pull-requests/74)
